item.title: Kingdom’s Return: Time-Eating Fruit and the Ancient Monster ‘Alchemist Introduction’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
Inti Creates has released a new trailer for hybrid 2D action and strategy game Kingdom’s Return: Time-Eating Fruit and the Ancient Monster introducing the Alchemist class.

The Alchemist is described as a tricky master of potions and status afflictions. He has access to a variety of noxious potions to throw at enemies, and can finish them off with powerful skills unlocked from the Class Circle, such as “Chemical Blaster Omega.”

Kingdom’s Return: Time-Eating Fruit and the Ancient Monster is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on April 23.

item.title: Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement creative director Shutaro Ida dies at age 52
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

"His passing is deeply regrettable, especially given the great promise of his future endeavors."

Shutaro Ida, creative director behind the upcoming Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement, has died at age 52 after a one-and-a-half years battle with cancer, developer ArtPlay announced.

“Shutaro has contributed significantly to the development of the gaming industry through the creation of numerous works,” reads a message from ArtPlay co-founder Koji Igarashi. “His passing is deeply regrettable, especially given the great promise of his future endeavors.

“The development of Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement, which Shutaro was leading, is now at its final stages. We will carry forward his legacy and strive with all our strength to complete this work worthy of his vision and name.”

Ida was also the director of Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night, and contributed to the development of various Castlevania games and Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain.

Read the full message from Igarashi below.

Announcement of the passing of Shutaro, Creative Director at ArtPlay

Early morning on Tuesday, February 10, 2026, our creative director Shutaro passed away at the age of 52 after battling against cancer for approximately one and a half years.

Shutaro has contributed significantly to the development of the gaming industry through the creation of numerous works. His passing is deeply regrettable, especially given the great promise of his future endeavors.

I express my deepest gratitude for the kindness of all of his fans during his lifetime and respectfully announce his passing.

The funeral was conducted only with close family members in accordance with the wishes of the bereaved family.

The development of Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement, which Shutaro was leading, is now at its final stages. We will carry forward his legacy and strive with all our strength to complete this work worthy of his vision and name.

We must respectfully decline any condolence visits, monetary gifts, floral tributes, or sympathy visiting to our company or his family. We deeply appreciate your understanding in this matter.

February 16, 2026
Koji Igarashi
Co-founder / ArtPlay Inc.

item.title: Iron Saga VS coming to PS5 in 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Saga Mode and more also planned for 2026.

Gameduchy will release mecha fighting game Iron Saga VS for PlayStation 5 in 2026, the developer announced.

Iron Saga VS first launched for PC via Steam on March 21, 2025. In addition to original mecha, it also features mecha from well-known intellectual properties such as Mazinger Z and Dancouga: Super Beast Machine God.

Outside of the PlayStation 5 version, 2026 will see the release of the new “Saga Mode” and an additional downloadable content character in Q2, the addition of Great Zeorymer in Q3, and a new arsenal, character-specific K.O. cinematics, and other surprise.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Get ready for an epic showdown! From the producers at Game Duchy comes the highly anticipated addition to the Iron Saga series—Iron Saga VS—soon arriving on Steam!

Embark on a New Adventure in Story Mode

After the earth-shattering Battle of Hinomaru, when the dust had finally settled, the world breathed a sigh of relief. Just as the world order was beginning to regain its balance, a formidable new threat emerged—the enigmatic “Mimicry” Mecha. With their astonishing adaptability and rapid evolution, they quickly became the bane of all—“Contra Mundum.”

But, in the realm of Mecha, the true battleground is often the human heart.

In Iron Saga VS, you will assume various roles, recording events from multiple perspectives. As the game progresses, high scores earned through excellent performances will unlock rewards. Can you rise to the challenge and save the world from the Mimicry menace?

Multiple Powerful Mecha Participate in The Battle

The first iconic roster of combat units include:

  • Mazinger Z Series
    • Mazinger Z, Great Mazinger, and Boss Robot
  • Dancouga: Super Beast Machine God 
    • Dancouga
  • Iron Saga Series
    • Kaguya, Qing Long, Mephisto, and Susanoo
  • Other original and collaborated mecha upcoming soon

Nostalgic Classic Battle Scenes

This game features iconic 2D fighting scenes, assuring top-notch game quality while delivering seamless graphics and action design. For fighting scenes, players can explore various styles, including classic battle scenes intertwined with collaborative narratives such as Photon Power Research Institute and Saotome Research Institute.

Dynamic Combat System

Iron Saga VS equips each mecha with an assortment of weapons and a variety of resource systems. Players are granted the freedom to tactically manage resources and combine skills as they engage in battles using their unique styles.

To guarantee character balance and elevate the competitive excitement, our game has been fine-tuned with the expertise of pro-fighting players to ensure you enjoy an exceptional combat experience.

Anthropomorphic AI System

In order to bring players a better single-player gaming experience, Iron Saga VS features an exclusive “anthropomorphic” AI system. Every AI mecha comes with its own set of tactics and gameplay styles, enriching the strategic depth of battles.

Global Online Clashes

This game applies Rollback Network Code to enhance players’ gaming experience and ensure superior online gameplay quality.

In the online mode, players can opt for arena floors or create private rooms for thrilling battles against skilled pilots worldwide. They can also climb the ranks and accumulate points through competitive matches, showcasing their strength with higher standings and scores!
